amendment.description: To establish an earmark moratorium for fiscal years 2011, 2012, and 2013.

action.text: Coburn motion to suspend Rule XXII to permit the consideration of amendment SA 4697 not agreed to by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 56. Record Vote Number: 255.
Coburn motion to suspend Rule XXII to permit the consideration of amendment SA 4697 made in Senate. To establish an earmark moratorium for fiscal years 2011, 2012, and 2013.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Coburn motion to suspend Rule XXII to permit the consideration of amendment SA 4697 not agreed to by Yea-Nay Vote. 39 - 56. Record Vote Number: 255.
